document.full_text: a field where children once played football has become a mass grave, red cross officials say, a reminder of lingering fighting between ivory coast forces and the last of laurent gbagbo's gunmen.
document.title: mass grave found in violent abidjan district
lines_and_colors: a field where children once played football has become a mass grave, red cross officials say, a reminder of lingering fighting between ivory coast forces and the last of laurent gbagbo's gunmen.
